title: Chelsea star David Luiz hits out at Diego Costa rumours by insisting 'people talk a lot without knowing anything'
text:
Sport Chelsea star David Luiz hits out at Diego Costa rumours by insisting 'people talk a lot without knowing anything' The Blues striker returned to the starting lineup against Hull with a goal and Luiz insists he is one of the best in the world Share David Luiz has praised Diego Costa after he returned to the Blues lineup and scored (Photo: Clive Rose) Share Get Chelsea FC   Thank you for subscribing! Could   
David Luiz has defended Diego Costa after recent speculation surrounding his future by insisting the rumours came from people who 'talk a lot without knowing anything.' 
Costa missed the 3-0 victory over Leicester, officially with a back injury, but returned last weekend, scoring the opener as the Blues downed Hull 2-0. 
The Brazilian defender praised his teammate for dealing with the added pressure and lauded the Spain international as one of the best players in the world. 
"That's his job, to score goals, and he works on that every day," Luiz told French outlet SFR Sport. "He does his job very well. He's a great player who's in fantastic form right now. Diego Costa celebrates after his goal vs the Tigers (Photo: AFP/Getty) Diego Costa appears to suggest recent speculation was unfounded (Photo: Reuters) Read More 
"He's playing well, and I'm happy for him because sometimes people talk a lot without knowing anything, and he's had to go through that. 
"But it's normal people talk about the best players in the world, Diego is one of them." Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
